resources.string: Already have an account in Wondrobe?
We\'ll send a link that will sign you into the app instantly

Wondrobe Terms and Conditions

Welcome to the Wondrobe community!

These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") outline how you can access and use the Wondrobe mobile app ("App"). Wondrobe is a social media platform where you can share content and connect with others. By using the App, you agree to these Terms. If you don’t agree, you won’t be able to use Wondrobe.

Understanding the Basics

Account: This refers to your personal Wondrobe profile created during registration.
Content: Any text, images, videos, or anything you share through the App.
User: Anyone who uses the Wondrobe App.
We/Us/Our/Wondrobe: Refers to the App owner, Wondrobe.

Using Wondrobe Right

We grant you permission (a license) to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes. You can’t use it for anything else without our written approval.

What’s Not Allowed on Wondrobe

There are things you can’t do on Wondrobe to keep the platform safe and enjoyable for everyone. Here are some examples:

Sharing content that’s illegal, harmful, or offensive (threats, harassment, hate speech, etc.).
Posting anything that violates someone else’s copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property rights.
Sending unwanted advertising or spam.
Impersonating someone else or lying about who you are.
Trying to gain unauthorized access to the App or other accounts.
Using methods that interfere with the App’s proper functioning.
Modifying content that doesn’t belong to you.
Damaging, disabling, or overloading the App or connected systems.
Breaking any laws or regulations.

Keeping Your Account Safe

We have the right to terminate your account and access to the App anytime, for any reason, without notice. This can also happen if you violate these Terms.

Cancelling Your Wondrobe Account

If you want to cancel your account, just contact us at wondrobe@gmail.com.

Your Content on Wondrobe

You own all your content, but by sharing it on the App, you grant us permission to use it in connection with Wondrobe and our business. This includes using, reproducing, modifying, distributing, and displaying your content, even after you terminate your account.

Content From Other Users

The App might have content shared by other users. We don’t control or endorse it, and we’re not responsible for its accuracy or legality. You acknowledge that you might see content that’s offensive, harmful, or inaccurate, and we won’t be liable for any damages arising from your use of such content.

Copyright Issues

If you believe someone’s content on the App infringes your copyright, you can submit a copyright infringement notice by emailing wondrobe@gmail.com.

Disclaimer of Warranties

We provide the App “as is” and “as available”. This means we don’t guarantee that it will always work perfectly, and the information or content on the App might have errors. You agree that you use the App at your own risk.

Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, we won’t be held liable for any damages you might experience by using the App.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at wondrobe@gmail.com.
